main event: Multiple residents in Hampton, Virginia reported seeing a bright white light hovering over their area on December 18, 1966 around 11:40 PM.
interesting points: The light appeared to descend slowly and then accelerate rapidly before disappearing.
Several witnesses reported hearing a humming sound associated with the light.
The report includes several black and white photographs from an older document or file related to Project Blue Book, which was a U.S. Air Force program that investigated UFOs.
The photographs show unidentified objects or phenomena in the sky, such as round, luminous objects and a disc-shaped UFO.
The report indicates that the object could not be positively identified as any known aircraft or natural phenomenon, and the case remained unresolved.
photographs: yes, the report includes several black and white photographs
